original_title: Sex Tapes: Lessons from a 7ft Penis & Friends
overview: Told through a mixture of archives, animation and musical numbers, this film chronicles the 20+ year career of Canadian underground star activist/performer Norman Nawrocki and his wide array of colourful characters such as a singing and dancing 7ft tall purple penis, giant orange butt plug and giant pink vagina.
title: Sex Tapes: Lessons from a 7ft Penis & Friends
